for_sales.sales_text: Astrid of Prinsted is a Passage Maker from “Chesapeake Lightcraft” USA. L.0.A. 11’6’’ Beam 4’ 6’’ in 9 mm ply & epoxy construction. Gunter rigged with all timber spars and polyester tan sails. (All spars fit in boat for transportation.) An ideal family dinghy for “Swallows & Amazons” style sailing. Trailer not included but could deliver locally. Located on Hampshire/West Sussex border near Emsworth.

boat.full_description: Gunter rigged with all timber spars and polyester tan sails. (All spars fit in boat for transportation.) An ideal family dinghy for “Swallows & Amazons” style sailing
boat.name: Astrid of Prinsted
